@xtraB.. The point of having comments is to share with others your own personal experience if the program works or not for each individual user.. If it doesn't work for some people then it doesn't mean its a complaint.. It means use at your own risk..

Guys, if it doesn't activate your windows try running it as administrator and then use the default installer. Also try disabling ur antivirus,

the personalization tool works fine when you run it as admin. If you change your theme or your start screen then you need to click log off button which will be showed up after you click apply metro. lock screen and profile picture  will work fine without restarting your system.

after reading KKS21199 message saying it works ... so i tried again ... finally now i put the tool & the pictures in the c: drive and it is working now...

the activator & the personalisation tools both works ok now...
